subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Javier Valentín hit a single in the ninth inning over a drawn-in infield to give the host Cincinnati Reds a 3-2 victory and a two-game sweep of the St. Louis Cardinals.
snippet: Javier Valentín hit a single in the ninth inning over a drawn-in infield to give the host Cincinnati Reds a 3-2 victory and a two-game sweep of the St. Louis Cardinals.
